definitions.definition: An emotional or psychological humiliation or bad experience.
definitions.example: how to overcome old hurts of the past

definitions.definition: A bodily injury causing pain; a wound or bruise.
A band on a trip-hammer helve, bearing the trunnions.

definitions.example: Does your leg still hurt? / It is starting to feel better.

definitions.definition: To cause (a creature) physical pain and/or injury.
definitions.example: If anybody hurts my little brother, I will get upset.
This latest gaffe hurts the legislator’s reelection prospects still further.
